special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control enters, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, you may have it deal 7 damage instead.
 Level 3
